InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input of the filter.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RL
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Box size
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The box side length used to wrap particles around if they exceed rL (or less than 0) in any dimension (only positive positions are allowed in the input, or they are wrapped around).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Overlap
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Overlap
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The space (in rL units) to extend processor particle ownership for ghost particles/cells. Needed for correct halo calculation when halos cross processor boundaries in parallel computation. Called DeadSize in the hacc config files.

IntVectorProperty.name: NP
IntVectorProperty.label: Seed particles
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Number of seeded particles in one dimension. Therefore, total simulation particles is np^3 (cubed).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BB
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Linking length
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Linking length measured in units of interparticle spacing and is dimensionless. Used to link particles into halos for the friends-of-friends (FOF) algorithm.

IntVectorProperty.name: PMin
IntVectorProperty.label: FOF particle threshold
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Minimum number of particles (threshold) needed before a group is called a friends-of-friends (FOF) halo.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DistanceConvertFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Distance Conversion Factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Some input files may have the world coordinates scaled from what the halo finder expects. This parameter is the conversion factor that will be multiplied by the positions of all particles.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MassConvertFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Mass Conversion Factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: For some inputs the particle mass may need to be converted before the halo finder can be run. This is the number that is multiplied by the particle mass.

IntVectorProperty.name: CenterFindingMethod
IntVectorProperty.label: Center Finding Method
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the method used to determine the halo "center".

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SmoothingLength
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Smoothing Length
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the smoothing length used by some of the center finding techniques.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: OmegaDM
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the OmegaDM parameter of the center finding algorithms. This parameter comes from the simulation input and is not needed if Center Finding Method is set to None.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: OmegaNU
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the OmegaNU parameter of the center finding algorithms. This parameter comes from the simulation input and is not needed if Center Finding Method is set to None.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Deut
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the Deut parameter of the center finding algorithms. This parameter comes from the simulation input and is not needed if Center Finding Method is set to None.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Hubble
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the Hubble parameter of the center finding algorithms. This parameter comes from the simulation input and is not needed if Center Finding Method is set to None.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RedShift
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the Redshift parameter of the center finding algorithms. This parameter comes from the simulation input and is not needed if Center Finding Method is set to None.

IntVectorProperty.name: FindSubhalos
IntVectorProperty.label: Find Subhalos
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Turn this on to also find subhalos in halos of sufficient size. See the advanced parameters to set subhalo finder options.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: AlphaFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Alpha Factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: A tuning parameter of subhalo finding. This controls how aggressively small suhalos will be grown. Alpha factor of 1.0 is the least agrressive. Only used if subhalo finding is enabled.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BetaFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Beta Factor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: A tuning parameter of subhalo finding. This controls how saddle points between subhalos are treated. Larger values allow identification of smaller scale structures such as tails. Only used if subhalo finding is enabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: NMin
IntVectorProperty.label: NMin
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The minimum number of close neighbors for a halo candidate to include a particle. If this many particles in the halo are close enough to the particle, then the particle is considered inside the halo.

IntVectorProperty.name: MinFOFSubhaloSize
IntVectorProperty.label: Minimum size for suhalo finding
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The miminum sized halo to run the subhalo finder of to subdivide further. Only used if subhalo finding is enabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: MinCandidateSize
IntVectorProperty.label: Minimum Subhalo Size
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: A subhalo candidate must have at least this many particles to be a subhalo.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumSPHNeighbors
IntVectorProperty.label: SPH Neighbors
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: A parameter of the subhalo finder. Only used if subhalo finding is enabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumNeighbors
IntVectorProperty.label: Number of Neighbors
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The nearest X particles will be used to determine the local density in the subhalo finder where X is the value of this parameter. Only used if subhalo finding is enabled.
